description: The Globalization of Knowledge Jürgen Renn (ed) 1.1 The Development of Knowledge as a Global Learning Process 1.2 The Role of Knowledge in Globalization Processes 1.3 A Theoretical Framework for Studying the Globalization of Knowledge 1.4 A Historical Outline of the Globalization of Knowledge 2.1 Introduction 2.2 Major Contributions to a History of Globalization 2.3 Knowledge and Science in Narratives of Globalization 2.4 Revisiting Europe from a Global Perspective 2.5 Capitalism and Industrial Revolution as Controversial Milestones of Globalization 2.6 Summary 2.
